title: 454 - How Hospitals Can Help Prevent Gun Violence
itunes:title: 454 - How Hospitals Can Help Prevent Gun Violence
description: Emergency departments not only treat gunshot wounds, they can help prevent them. Trauma surgeon Dr. Chethan Sathya talks with Dr. Josh Sharfstein about treating gun violence as a public health issue in emergency departments, how to help people at risk of being shot, and the push to make conversations about gun safety standard practice.
